CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE FUNCTION "PPM"."CRV_SUM_BUCKETS_TBLS_BLOB_FCT" ( p_cursor SYS_REFCURSOR, p_cal_cursor SYS_REFCURSOR, p_options VARCHAR DEFAULT NULL ) RETURN CRV_BUCKETS PIPELINED PARALLEL_ENABLE ( PARTITION p_cursor BY ANY ) IS BEGIN FOR ao_rec IN ( SELECT * FROM TABLE( CRV_SQL_CURVE_PKG.SUM_BUCKETS_TABLE_BLOB( p_cursor, p_cal_cursor, p_options ) ) ) LOOP pipe row( CRV_BUCKET ( ao_rec.id, ao_rec.field, ao_rec.scenario, ao_rec.calendar_key , ao_rec.ts1_date, ao_rec.ts1_slice, ao_rec.ts2_date, ao_rec.ts2_slice, ao_rec.ts3_date, ao_rec.ts3_slice, ao_rec.ts4_date,
